name: Vegan Buffalo Potato Skins
description: This amazing vegan version of buffalo potato skins is sure to be a crowd pleaser at your next party!

video.name: Vegan Buffalo Potato Skins
video.description: Crispy potato skins are filled with shredded soy curls sautéed with onion, buffalo sauce, green onion, and almond crema. They are topped with guacamole and more creamy buffalo sauce.

recipeIngredient: 1/3 cup Primal Kitchen Jalapeño Buffalo sauce
1/3 cup almond crema ((cashew cream sauce or vegan cream cheese_)

recipeInstructions.text: Spray potatoes with avocado oil and place on air fryer rack or basket. Air fry for 45 - 50 minutes at 400F until the potatoes are tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Spray potatoes with avocado oil and place on air fryer rack or basket. Air fry for 45 - 50 minutes at 400F until the potatoes are tender.

recipeInstructions.text: While the potatoes are cooking, bring your broth to a boil in a small pot over high heat. Place the soy curls in a heat proof bowl and pour the broth on them. Using a large spoon, press down so the soy curls absorb all the liquid.
recipeInstructions.name: While the potatoes are cooking, bring your broth to a boil in a small pot over high heat. Place the soy curls in a heat proof bowl and pour the broth on them. Using a large spoon, press down so the soy curls absorb all the liquid.

recipeInstructions.text: Once the soy curls cool down a bit, squeeze all the liquid you can out of them. Place a third of the soy curls in the blender and process on low, until the soy curls are shredded. Repeat with the rest of the soy curls.
recipeInstructions.name: Once the soy curls cool down a bit, squeeze all the liquid you can out of them. Place a third of the soy curls in the blender and process on low, until the soy curls are shredded. Repeat with the rest of the soy curls.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onion and sauté until translucent. Stir in shredded soy curls and sauté until it browns slightly. Lower heat and add almond crema, Buffalo sauce, and green onions. Stir to combine. Season to taste. Remove from heat and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onion and sauté until translucent. Stir in shredded soy curls and sauté until it browns slightly. Lower heat and add almond crema, Buffalo sauce, and green onions. Stir to combine. Season to taste. Remove from heat and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove potatoes from air fryer and let cool slightly. Cut in half horizontally and scoop out the insides leaving about 1/4 inch of potato on the skin.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove potatoes from air fryer and let cool slightly. Cut in half horizontally and scoop out the insides leaving about 1/4 inch of potato on the skin.

recipeInstructions.text: Mash the potato insides with a fork and mix them in with the soy curl mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Mash the potato insides with a fork and mix them in with the soy curl mixture.

recipeInstructions.text: Spray the potato skins with avocado oil and air fry them for 15 min, flipping them half way through.
recipeInstructions.name: Spray the potato skins with avocado oil and air fry them for 15 min, flipping them half way through.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill the potato skins with the Buffalo soy curls and place under the oven broiler for 2 minutes. Top with almond crema, guacamole, green onions, and Buffalo sauce.
recipeInstructions.name: Fill the potato skins with the Buffalo soy curls and place under the oven broiler for 2 minutes. Top with almond crema, guacamole, green onions, and Buffalo sauce.

keywords: buffalo soy curls, gluten-free, vegan, vegan potato skins
